text: Ruslan Isidorovich Khubetsov (; born 8 March 1973) is a former Russian football player. His son David Khubetsov is now a professional goalkeeper as well. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Elista players Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Spartak Vladikavkaz players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:FC Spartak- UGP Anapa players
title: Ruslan Khubetsov
